daily conversation a.s.a.p
or a yes a P or also called a SAP it
means as soon as possible that is really
very fast this is a very common phrase
we use in our conversation a yes ap is
an acronym for as soon as possible which
people usually use I guess because it's
to log to say as soon as possible this
phrase is commonly used while writing
emails when you want something urgently
okay so let's look at some examples on
how to use this phrase in our daily
conversation example 1 we need to make a
public announcement of all our new
products X app example to forward me the
clients email ASAP example 3 well
